content: this chevron was designed with a very dear friend in mine mae mae was born in 1905 and while still alive shared so many memories with me we are celebrating mae with this beautiful chevron pattern **pattern notes/special stitches ** bead stitch https //hearthookhome com/bead-stitch-crochet-tutorial/ linked double_crochet https //hearthookhome com/linked-double-crochet-stitch-tutorial/ crossed double_crochet https //hearthookhome com/crossed-double-crochet-stitch-tutorial/ half_double_crochet https //hearthookhome com/video-tutorial-how-to-crochet-the-half-double-crochet/ if you want the least possible ends to weave in you could simply use one color and make a textured statement chevron i m thinking all white/cream for a wedding gift or a pale green or yellow for a baby shower gift or even a darker color like purple or black would look stunning as well
